architectural_notes: Ensure language selection is managed globally (e.g., i18n provider/context) so all UI strings re-render on language change, not just top bar.
known_issues: Language switch currently only updates the top bar; the rest of the app content does not change language (regression; expected 100% of content to update).

existing_features.title: Fix the language-switch regression so that changing the language updates 100% of user-visible text across the entire app (not only the top header bar), without requiring a page reload.

Remove/replace hardcoded non-localized strings in pages and components so they are sourced from the translation system (LanguageContext + translations) or from language-aware backend data, ensuring all in-game/generated texts also switch language correctly.
Ensure React Query data that is language-dependent is refetched (or recomputed) on language change so backend-sourced localized content updates consistently across the app.

projectName: Fix language switching so all app content updates across pages and games
